column1: The #XR industry needs to act with maturity & is in dire need of new thought leaders Let me spare you from the self appointed Voices in #XR (Exploitation) & Covid19-Reality "VR in the time of Coronavirus" podcasts: In a pandemic All shared VR AR HMD activity should be stopped

column2: #EFFUXR s are trying to make $out of Coronavirus @twitter /text based conferencing will do just fine as a @zoom_us &amp
column3: IRL conference replacement The last thing business/brands want if they are functional during a #COVID19 pandemic is to exploit it
